author: James Martin
method: In a small bowl mix together the whipped cream and lemon curd. Layer a glass with the strawberries, biscuits and almonds. Spoon in the lemon curd and cream mixture and garnish with the mint sprig.
ingredients: 50g/2oz double cream, whipped ,  50g/2oz ready-made lemon curd,  25g/1oz strawberries, thinly sliced,  25g/1oz cantuccini biscuits, crushed,  25g/1oz flaked almonds, toasted,  mint leaf, to garnish
